metadata.title: USN-5211-1 -- Linux kernel vulnerability
metadata.description: Nadav Amit discovered that the hugetlb implementation in the Linux kernel did not perform TLB flushes under certain conditions. A local attacker could use this to leak or alter data from other processes that use huge pages.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5211-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-kvm-cloud-tools-4.4.0-1099 - 4.4.0-1099.108 linux-tools-4.4.0-1099-kvm - 4.4.0-1099.108 linux-buildinfo-4.4.0-1099-kvm -
